[`EditorSuggestTriggerInfo`](../EditorSuggestTriggerInfo) › [`start`](./start)

## EditorSuggestTriggerInfo.start property

The start position of the triggering text. This is used to position the popover.

**Signature:**

```typescript
start: EditorPosition;
```
